channel.title: Comments on: Two stories of sexual assault

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/two-stories-of-sexual-assault/#comment-7609">Samir Hachani</a>.
Thanks for sharing, Samir. It's terrible that people are still abusing the suffering of others for their own personal gain.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Samir Hachani.

Thanks for sharing, Samir. It’s terrible that people are still abusing the suffering of others for their own personal gain.

item.title: By: Samir Hachani
item.dc:creator: Samir Hachani
item.description: I don't know if it really in the same"league"but I share: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/18/magazine/title-ix-sexual-harassment-accusations.html
item.content:encoded:
I don’t know if it really in the same”league”but I share:
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/18/magazine/title-ix-sexual-harassment-accusations.html

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/two-stories-of-sexual-assault/#comment-6537">Samir Hachani</a>.
I remember our meeting fondly, Samir! And stand by the words I said then. And yes to a non-alcoholic beer one day - I've cut out drinking for the foreseeable future, just so I can keep a more steady mind through all this nightmare. Take care too, for now :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Samir Hachani.

I remember our meeting fondly, Samir! And stand by the words I said then. And yes to a non-alcoholic beer one day – I’ve cut out drinking for the foreseeable future, just so I can keep a more steady mind through all this nightmare. Take care too, for now ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Samir Hachani
item.dc:creator: Samir Hachani
item.description: Hi Jon, Let me just say this:We met through Internet for an academic work.We met physically in Tromso ( Norway) for the Munin Conference.I remember that when I introduce myself to you ( you were keynote speaker), you just were very happy and hugged me ( even bestowing upon me the title of " Global South Open Access Specialist).That gesture touched me as it proved to me one thing : you are profoundly human PERIOD.People nowadays are mean and take your kindness for weakness.Keep on being yourself, you'll succeed.And next time we meet ,We'll have a beer ( non alcoholic that is ).Take care bro !!!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jon,
Let me just say this:We met through Internet for an academic work.We met physically in Tromso ( Norway) for the Munin Conference.I remember that when I introduce myself to you ( you were keynote speaker), you just were very happy and hugged me ( even bestowing upon me the title of ” Global South Open Access Specialist).That gesture touched me as it proved to me one thing : you are profoundly human PERIOD.People nowadays are mean and take your kindness for weakness.Keep on being yourself, you’ll succeed.And next time we meet ,We’ll have a beer ( non alcoholic that is ).Take care bro !!!!
